duties_responsibilities.duty: Sell software maintenance agreements (SMA’s) to enable customer success with Enterprise Data Systems.
Directly engage with end-users across the Americas territory primarily through outbound and inbound telephone sales activities.
Work with the software product specialists to focus on acquiring new customers and retaining the existing installed base of customers.
Manage your own sales funnel and proactively seek out business opportunities via Marcom or other creative business initiatives.
Regular communication of deals, issues and opportunities with the relevant specialists.
Interpret customer needs and proactively act to understand those needs, actively build business opportunities and represent Agilent in all sales-oriented activities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors or Masters Degree in technical field of Chemistry, Biology (preferred)
